  • Method Details

    • initGame

      public Map<String,Player> initGame(GameModel model, Map<String,VirtualClient> clients, Object lock) throws IllegalStateOperationException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Initializes the game by setting up players, drawing initial cards, and updating the game state. Usable only in CreateGameModelState state of the game

      This method performs the following steps:

      1. Creates players from the provided client usernames.
      2. Sets the starter card, draws initial gold and resource cards, and draws objective cards for each player.
      3. Refills the gold and resource decks on the board and draws common objective cards.
      4. Updates the initial scores of players on the board.
      5. Create a lock listener for every player
      6. Sets up listeners and connection statuses for each client.
      7. Changes the state of the game model to the setup state.
      Specified by:
      initGame in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing the current state of the game.
      clients - A LinkedHashMap of client usernames and their corresponding VirtualClient instances.
      Returns:
      A map of player usernames to Player objects representing the initialized players.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException - if model is in SetupGameModelState, RunningGameModelState, LastTurnGameModelState, ShowDownGameModelState or EndGameModelState

    • chooseSecretObjective

      public void chooseSecretObjective(GameModel model, String username, Integer index) throws IllegalStateOperationException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Assign a secret objective to the player between the two already saved in Player model
      Specified by:
      chooseSecretObjective in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing the current state of the game.
      username - The username of the player choosing the secret objective.
      index - The index of the secret objective card to be chosen (1 or 2).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException - if model is in CreationGameModelState, RunningGameModelState, LastTurnGameModelState, ShowDownGameModelState or EndGameModelState

    • playStarter

      public void playStarter(GameModel model, String username) throws IllegalStateOperationException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Allows a player to play their starter card and checks if all players have played their starter card.

      If all players have played are in the state 'start', the game state is advanced to the running state, the first player is set to play, and all game listeners are notified.

      Specified by:
      playStarter in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing the current state of the game.
      username - The username of the player playing their starter turn.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException - if model is in CreationGameModelState, SetupGameModelState, RunningGameModelState, LastTurnGameModelState, ShowDownGameModelState or EndGameModelState

    • play

      public void play(GameModel model, String username, Point point) throws IllegalStateOperationException, IllegalPlaceCardException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Allows a player to play their turn by placing a card at a specified point on the game board.
      Specified by:
      play in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing the current state of the game.
      username - The username of the player playing their turn.
      point - The point on the game board where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException - if model is in CreationGameModelState, SetupGameModelState or EndGameModelState
      IllegalPlaceCardException - if the card cannot be legally placed at the specified point.

    • detectEndGame

      public void detectEndGame(GameModel model, Boolean bothEmptyDeck)
      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Detects if the game should transition to the end game state based on the current player's score and deck status.

      The game transitions to different states depending on the conditions:

      • If the current player's score is greater than or equal to the game points threshold or both decks are empty the game status should transitions to the next status of the game.
      • If the current player is the last player in the turn order, the game transitions to LastTurnGameModelState otherwise it transitions to ShowDownGameModelState.
      Specified by:
      detectEndGame in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing the current state of the game.
      bothEmptyDeck - A boolean indicating whether both decks are empty.

    • endGame

      public void endGame(GameModel model, String lastPlayerConnected) throws IllegalStateOperationException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Ends the game and calculates the final scores for all players.

      This method performs the following steps:

      1. Calculates the scores for each player's individual and common objective cards.
      2. Determines the player with the highest score.
      3. Sends a command to all clients indicating that the game is over and providing the final scores.
      Specified by:
      endGame in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing the current state of the game.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException - if model is in CreationGameModelState, SetupGameModelState, RunningGameModelState, LastTurnGameModelState or ShowDownGameModelState

    • disconnectPlayer

      Description copied from interface: GameModelState
      Executes the disconnection of a player. If the disconnected player is not the current turn player, it does nothing. See GameModel executeDisconnectPlayer
      Specified by:
      disconnectPlayer in interface GameModelState
      Parameters:

      LastPlayerRemainedException
